In the general case all of it can be put together in the following scheme:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/262fde5f-73c8-425c-b6ae-54e23eb4c734/img24.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":450,\"height\":248}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First, the requirements are created (what we are going to develop), then these requirements are implemented, and then the achieved result is tested. After that it is delivered to the Customer (or transferred to the next iteration) and moved into the maintenance phase. In order for the development to be performed successfully, some other processes are employed:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – to correctly plan the project activities and assign the tasks to team members, to monitor the project status and control its execution.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Risk Management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – to define potential issues and prevent them or to outline the actions that can minimize the negative effects of these issues.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Configuration and Change Management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – to keep track what files are located where, in what systems, how the product is build, to be able to trace which change or requirement was realized in which build in order to organize efficient simultaneous work.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project and Product Quality Assurance\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – to ensure the project's success and that all goals are achieved (by means of, for example, reviewing the requirements before their implementation, training the staff and introducing new technologies, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Requirement means of testing, performance optimization and peer activities take place within each one of them.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Of course, depending on the peculiarities of each specific project, some of these processes may be excluded. But if one or another process is employed, it should be documented, i.e. it must be described, how the process is being executed on this project, are there any differences from the standard process.\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn more about the other processes please follow the links
